verses.roman:
tāhā dekhi' jñāna haya--'ei nārāyaṇa
yei tāṅre dekhe, kare kṛṣṇa-saṅkīrtana

synonyms: tāhā dekhi'—seeing that; jñāna haya—one comes to the conclusion; ei nārāyaṇa—He is the Supreme Personality of Godhead, Nārāyaṇa Himself; yei—anyone who; tāṅre—Him; dekhe—sees; kare—performs; kṛṣṇa-saṅkīrtana—chanting of the holy name of Kṛṣṇa.
translation: "When one sees all these features, one takes Him to be Nārāyaṇa Himself. Whoever sees Him immediately begins to chant the holy name of Kṛṣṇa.
